synopsis.text: TV-station part-timer Yuuki, a high school girl with a knack for curiosity, stumbles upon an intriguing duo, Nagisa and Michio, who lead double lives as private detectives and members of an all-male pop group. Unable to shake off her fascination, Yuuki decides to trail them, only to find herself entangled in their world. As the detectives' past resurfaces, the agency's cute female member is kidnapped, plunging the trio into a whirlwind of mystery and danger. Based on Ooya Kazumi's manga, this special promises an exciting blend of music, mystery, and suspense.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
